name: Lost Civilizations
description: Follow the map and find the ruined digsite.

dialogue.describe: The old dig site I once worked at is on that map. Go there, and we'll talk.
dialogue.offer: The old dig site I once worked at is on that map. I want my vengance for my colleagues, and I want you to help me.
dialogue.advice: Those... things that killed them are fast, hard to hit with sword or bow. However, one of my friends knew basic magic, I saw those things drop like flies to a firebolt.
dialogue.rejected: Please? This means so much to me.
dialogue.inquire: Do you know where we're going?
dialogue.success_lie: This doesn't look like the place...

name: As Above...
description: Follow the map and find the ruined digsite.

dialogue.describe: Now that we're in, we need to go to the center of town, that's where we'll find the excavation enterance.
dialogue.offer: Now that we're in, we need to go to the center of town, that's where we'll find the excavation enterance. We were pretty deep down, so watch out.
dialogue.advice: If you thought those things on the surface were bad, there's probably worse the deeper we go. Watch out.
dialogue.rejected: Please? This means so much to me.
dialogue.inquire: Do you know where we're going?
dialogue.success_lie: This doesn't look like the place...

name: Stardust Crusaders
description: Find and recruit the awaiting mercenaries.

dialogue.describe: I know some old buddies of mine, and they're in on this 'project' of ours.
dialogue.offer: I know some old buddies of mine, and they're in on this 'project' of ours. They should be here soon, and I want you to make sure they're alright.
dialogue.advice: They're good people, and I told them about you. They're also armed to the teeth, so don't worry about monsters on your way there.
dialogue.rejected: Please? This means so much to me.
dialogue.inquire: Do you know where they are?

name: So Below.
description: Find and kill the otherworldly shaman.

dialogue.offer: When my excavation team was killed, I noticed a strange, fish-like humanoid. It was casting spells, curses, you name it. It's also what brought all those spider-like things with it. Let's kill it, tis vengance enough.
dialogue.advice: Keep your wits about you. Even with four trained mercenaries, there's a lot of nasties in those caves below.
dialogue.rejected: Please? This means so much to me.
dialogue.inquire: Do you know where they are?

name: Tomb Raiding
description: Follow the map and find the ruins.

dialogue.describe: An old ruin I once worked at is on that map. Go there, then we'll talk.
dialogue.offer: An old ruin I once worked at is on that map. I want my vengance for my colleagues, and I want you to help me.
dialogue.advice: That place is crawling with zombies, skeletons, you name it. Bring a weapon, and don't go in unprepared.
dialogue.rejected: Please? This means so much to me.
dialogue.inquire: Do you know where we're going?
dialogue.success_lie: This doesn't look like the place...
